Containers.Name: File Activity
Containers.Description:
This plugin displays recent open/write/modify file activity on each disk, Unassigned Devices disks, and cache/pool devices. It can help to understand why disks are spinning up from write/modify file and directory activity.
This plugin shares basic info like the plugin and Unraid version with the developer to help improve future updates. It doesn't collect any personal data, and if you'd rather not share, you can easily turn it off in the settings.
